name: Jungle Survival-Dinosaur Hunt
description:
Play the best Dinosaur Survival battle game and learn the art of survival in the jungle. Fight with the wild jungle animals like dinosaur and save compete them by using your fighting skills. Eliminate your fears by playing the super jungle survival animal battle and experience the wilderness of the Jungles. Fight with wild animals and explore how to survive in the jungle by giving challenge yourself to survive in an unknown terrain with very few available resources. The super jungle survival animal brings to you, one of its kind survival courses to test your spirits and to make your adrenals rush to fight and survive in the wild. Survival in the wild needs a person to be physically agile, mentally strong, alert and easily adaptable to changes. We help you achieve these.
Our instructors, the Veterans of the Indian Special Armed Forces, who are masters in survival, will be your guiding light to fight, survive and to challenge your instincts to come out victorious in survival situations.

Features for Jungle Survival Animal Battle

- Explore the wilderness!
- Build your house from the ground up!
- Fight with wild Dinosaurs
- Use fighting strategies to defeat Dinosaurs
- HD graphics with realistic Jungle sound effects
- Multiple Fighting levels
